mapper.insert: insert into member(id, nickname, pass, flag) values (#{id},#{nickname}, #{pass}, #{flag})
insert into detail(id, url, regdate) values (#{id}, #{url}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where (id=#{id}) and pass=#{pass, jdbcType=VARCHAR }
select m.id, m.nickname, d.url from member m join detail d on m.id=d.id where (m.id=#{id})
mapper.update: update detail set birth=#{birth, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, gender=#{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, genre=#{genre, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regdate=sysdate where id=#{id}
update detail set url=#{url}, regdate=sysdate where id=#{id}
update member set pass=#{change, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
update member set flag=#{flag} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from member where nickname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{nickname}), '%')
